Message:
One day, the chief minister
from the Church of Longinus
paid me a visit...

The Church has
the teachings from God,

so I would have never taken
them as people interested
in fortune telling...

She even visited me
without any sort of escort...
Such a strange person.

“What brings you to me, my dear?
It appears you didn’t come to
simply have your fortune told...”
saying I was right on the mark.

That was more intuition
than divination, though.

She suddenly lowered
her head to me—

begging for me to use
my powers of divination
to guide those who lost
their way.

I thought her to be yet another
blind believer of my divination,

but there was something...
peculiar about her.

On top of that,
to bear the fates of The World
and The Wheel of Fortune...

It looks like something
interesting is on the horizon.
